actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide tax-exempt status for organizations which assist in introducing into public use technology developed by operating research organizations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that organizations which introduce into public use technology developed by operating research organizations shall be treated as tax-exempt organizations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide tax-exempt status for organizations which assist in introducing into public use technology developed by operating research organizations.
